name: Ludum Dare 52 (hunttis)
description:
Feast of Gévaudan

The annoying peasants of the village have cursed you. And now they're celebrating the harvest feast! Take your revenge and kill them!

The clerics are too strong, they cannot be killed, but they will kill you if they catch you. Avoid them and kill the ordinary peasants.

Watch out, if they panic, they will sound the alarm which means your death!

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Space to pounce when you're in range

Enjoy the sounds and music, we had a blast making those 

Quite a lot of things needed tuning, but working folks have to choose when the battle needs to end, so I hope you can enjoy the experience even with its rough sides 

Code: N1cc3, eloraju, hunttis

Graphics: Hannah_Noon 

Music, creature and human animations: Miigii

“Dialogue”  : N1cc3, eloraju, hunttis

Growling: Zelda the labrador

Crunchy sounds: Loki the corgi and some carrots
